marklogic.body: its funny cause all dinosaurs will die. adam22 will soon loose his (somewhat) youthful edge and will go the way of the limp bizkit. realizing his own demise he will franticly try to get other projects in motion focusing his creative ability's in too many different areas, quickly becoming tired and played out. with the smell of desperation looming on the battlefield his enemies will soon realize his weaknesses and focus their attacks at his thin spread weak points bringing down the giant at the ankles. history repeats itself and trying to build empires from sandcastles will only get washed away with the changing Tide. you can only be the ruling power for so long until someone with a greater appetite masterminds a better strategy based solely on your weaknesses and the peoples Thirst for something fresh and new. jussss kiddin everything stays the same forever, syke.
